ramin.des: Ratio to the total area for setting a minimum threshold of the selected area

ramax.des: Ratio to the total area for setting a maximum threshold of the selected area

rmor_sel.des: Ratio to the maximum value of the matrix after applying all morphological transform. This is used to filter out values below the threshold.

mor_ch.des: Height of the closing kernel of morphological transform.

mor_cw.des: Width of the closing kernel of morphological transform.

mor_oh.des: Height of the opening kernel of morphological transform.

mor_ow.des: Width of the opening kernel of morphological transform.

mor_ds.des: Length of the w and h of the dilation kernel.

cwhratio.des: Minimum ratio of w/h and h/w of the contour rectangle.

rlbpmin.des: Ratio to the maximum of lbp matrix. Only values ABOVE this range will be selected.

ramax.des: Ratio to the maximum of lbp matrix. Only values BELOW this range will be selected.
